column4: I booted lucid in an Eee 1005hab.  I hooked up an external monitor and it recognized it, but when I tried to make the monitors not mirror the desktop and panels went away!  The cursor was still there and moved correctly between the two monitors.
does the eee1005 videocard support that? none mirror dual monitors?
it is working fine right now in Karmic
oh, lucid, your in the wrong channel, visit #ubuntu+1
